definition: to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to state/to tell/to narrate/to relate
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Stories can be told on any platform.
sentences.chinese: 故事可以以任何一種形式述說。

sentences.english: This is a story about a prince's vengeance.
She doesn’t tell me one ofthose stories about the old ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 她不再和我述說我們以色列人先祖的事蹟了。

sentences.english: 8He told them everything that had happened and sent them to Joppa.
sentences.chinese: 把這事都述說給他們聽，就打發他們往約帕去。

sentences.english: A man sing love songs, the white knuckles, declare we hopeless love .
sentences.chinese: 一個人唱情歌，泛白的指節，述說我們無望的愛情。

sentences.english: He described rushing floodwaters up to 20 feet deep in some places.
sentences.chinese: 他描述說奔湧的洪水在某些地區深達20英尺。

sentences.english: Elijah had spoken the Word of God boldly to kings and rulers.
sentences.chinese: 伊萊賈曾大膽地向君王和統治者述說神的話。

sentences.english: And when he had declared all these things unto them, he sent them to Joppa.
sentences.chinese: 把這事都述說給他們聽，就打發他們往約帕去。

sentences.english: The prophet that hath a dream, let him tell a dream;
sentences.chinese: 得夢的先知可以述說那夢。

sentences.english: In the real environment and space, it narrates the preciousness and tenaciousness of life.
sentences.chinese: 它在現實的環境和空間中，述說著生命的珍貴和頑強。

sentences.english: A young sailor, Ishmael , tells the story of their exciting and dangerous trip.
sentences.chinese: 來看看年輕水手依修魯述說這段刺激危險的旅程。

sentences.english: The heavens declare the glory of God and the firmament shows His handiwork.
sentences.chinese: 諸天述說神的榮耀，穹蒼傳揚祂的手段。

sentences.english: He loved to recite his personal experiences.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡述說他個人的經歷。

sentences.english: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day;
sentences.chinese: 我的口終日要述說你的公義，和你的救恩。

sentences.english: Love you than I can say, and the use of text messaging, full of Zhongchang to you tells me.
sentences.chinese: 愛你在心口難開，且用短信，向你述說我滿腹衷腸。

sentences.english: And he told Zares his wife, and his friends, all that had befallen him.
sentences.chinese: 哈曼將所遭遇的，都給他的愛妻則勒士和朋友述說了。

definition: to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
experience/CL:個|个[ge4],次[ci4]/to experience/to go through
to recall/memories/CL:個|个[ge4]
countless/numberless/innumerable
to tell in detail
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
perhaps/maybe
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
changes/vicissitudes
unceasing torrent (idiom)/talking non-stop/gabbling forty to the dozen
to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
luck/fate/opportunity/the ups and downs of life
